content.text: 1) Cover a medium sized baking sheet with a single layer of bread slices.
2) Brush the slices with olive oil.
4) In a mixing bowl, combine the tomatoes, olive oil and basil.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "combine"@21:28 / AC
		:ppt ( "the tomatoes"@29:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "olive oil"@43:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "basil"@57:62 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a mixing bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Place bread under broiler until lightly browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "bread"@9:14 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-6-0 "broiler"@21:28 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until lightly browned"@29:50 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Remove from broiler and top with the tomato mixture.
